name: Disco Zombies
description:
Game Controls: AWSD to move, mouse to shoot, F key to boost forward the way your facing, G to drop a weapon, and B to interact with an object.

Hello, thank you for checking out my game! The game is currently test of concept right now. It has the chance to turn into a game, but it might not. Currently there is a lot of bugs and fix's that need to be fixed. I'm currently not taking any bug reports because there is just so many. Also there are a lot of  features not added yet. So as I go along and fixing the bugs I will be adding new  features to the game. More information will be provided as the game progress. There will also be weekly updates to the game. So come back in and check on the game progress. Thank you again and I hope you will stick with me on my first released game. 

Current Released Version: 1.5.0
